CSSShape.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The <shape> CSS data type defines the specific form (shape) of a region. The region represents the part of an element to which the clip property applies.

blockquote.para: Note: <shape> and rect() work in conjunction with clip, which has been deprecated in favor of clip-path. When possible, use clip-path and the {{cssxref("<basic-shape>")}} data type instead.

value.see: A graph showing top, right, bottom, and left, as described below. These define the rectangle's shape. The upper left corner is defined by the top and left values. The bottom right corner is defined by the bottom and right values.
